content.p: BERNAMA Internship Description: The Malaysian National News Agency or BERNAMA, a statutory body, was set up by an Act of Parliament in 1967 and began operations in May 1968. The agency has its offices in all the states in Malaysia and correspondents in Singapore and Jakarta and stringers or retainers in Washington, London, Manila, New Delhi, Dhaka, Melbourne and Vancouver. Equipped with fully computerised operations, it provides general and economic news services and screen-based real time financial information services to subscribers in Malaysia and Singapore. BERNAMAâ€™s role as a source of reliable and latest news is well known among local and international media including government agencies, corporations, universities and individuals nationwide. How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form here. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
